entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who pointed his wand at the bottle to remove the cork. He is also the one who has an injured hand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who asks Dumbledore about his injured hand and is concerned about it.

entities.name: bob ogden
entities.description: Bob Ogden is someone that Dumbledore has an appointment with, but no further information is given in the text.

relationships.description: Dumbledore's injured hand seems to be a concern for Harry, as he asks about it multiple times.
Dumbledore has an appointment with Bob Ogden, which is mentioned in the text.
